title: Metrostylish but more solid sans serif
content:
Hi all,

This font is used on Australias ten one HD channel in their commercials only. (Taken from youtube so a little blurry).

[http://wtf2.myfonts.com/uploads/images/23/2399346a3eb304aed87e9874275466...](http://web.archive.org/web/20091120171244/http:/wtf2.myfonts.com/uploads/images/23/2399346a3eb304aed87e9874275466d2.29253.jpeg "http://wtf2.myfonts.com/uploads/images/23/2399346a3eb304aed87e9874275466d2.29253.jpeg")

Any one with any idea? I think its defining characteristic is the way it sloopes downward at the top of the D, R and downward at the bottom of the U’s, G, etc.

Any help would be sweet
author: TF22Raptor

comments.content: Has a lot of [Cholla Sans](http://web.archive.org/web/20091120171244/http:/www.identifont.com/show?1FV) (by Sibylle Hagmann) in it.
Cholla Sans is close but not quite.
Thankyou stephenlording right on the money
What would you classify this font as guys just Sans Serif?
